Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Coincidence of two novel arylsulfatase A alleles and mutation 459 + 1G > A within a family with metachromatic leukodystrophy : molecular basis of phenotypic heterogeneity .

Let's think step by step.
1. Metachromatic leukodystrophy (MLD) - Metachromatic leukodystrophy is a lysosomal storage disorder caused by a deficiency of arylsulfatase A. It is the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
